item.title: php-sql-parser
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Full support for the MySQL dialect for the following statement types SELECT INSERT UPDATE DELETE REPLACE via php-sql-parser Targeting MySQL syntax is a reasonable trade off. It appears to handle reasonably complex queries as well. I’m going to keep this link handy, I’ve got a feeling there are some fun (and perhaps twisted) ways to […]
item.content:encoded:
Full support for the MySQL dialect for the following statement types

  • SELECT
  • INSERT
  • UPDATE
  • DELETE
  • REPLACE

via php-sql-parser

Targeting MySQL syntax is a reasonable trade off. It appears to handle reasonably complex queries as well.

I’m going to keep this link handy, I’ve got a feeling there are some fun (and perhaps twisted) ways to make use of this.
